data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Centre.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Centre, Haiti
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 99,037 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary: On average, 42 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Centre, Haiti.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Centre that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, help the 99,037 believers in Centre to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Centre, Haiti.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 99,037 believers in Centre.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary:
the state of Centre, Haiti has a population of 565,000.

We estimate Centre has 99,037 people who might know Jesus, 436,831 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 29,131 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 565,000 citizens of Centre, Haiti, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
